t: Chapter 7A. Trash Collection Noise Violation Abatement.

c.t: § 8–731. Complaints of trash collection noise violations; hearings; notice of infraction.

c.x: Any person may file a complaint of a trash collection noise violation with
The name of the individual or company alleged to have violated section 2806
The location of the alleged violation;
The date and time of the alleged violation; and
Any additional identifying information about the trash truck or its driver.
A complaint under subsection (a) of this section shall be submitted in writ
A District inspector need not witness a violation for a complaint to be val
A complainant under subsection (a) of this section may appear and give test
If the Mayor deems that the complaint has merit, the Mayor shall file a Not
This section shall not apply to complaints relating to Department of Public
